Class AmplitudePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tic0012.loselessoundrecord.classes.AmplitudePrinter

  • public class AmplitudePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Prints sound amplitude into bitmap
    Author:
    tic0012, Michal Tichý

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Short> amplitudes
      All RAW amplitudes from WAF file
      private int amplStretch
      Number of RAW amplitudes, which will be stretch into one
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> gunShotSamples
      List of gunShots indexes(sample number)
      private int imgHeight
      Image canvas height in px
      private int imgWidth
      Default width of bitmap in px
      private int maxBitmapSeconds
      Max bitmap length in seconds
      private int sampleRate
      Sample rate in Hz
      private short SHORT_MAX
      Maximum SHORT value used for amplitude transform from source to image
      private short SHORT_MIN
      Negative max SHORT value used for amplitude transform from source to image
      private Bitmap shotIcon
      GunShot icon
